attributes.action: Ensure that No 'Road Tax' element is added to Pleasurecraft Diesel Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that the EU has refused the extension of derogation of Fuel Tax for Pleasurecraft, there is no justification for setting the tax at the same level as at Filling Stations. Boats obviously do not use roads, thus we should not be charged for their upkeep.
